<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Brightsoul](/Feats.aspx?ID=2551) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 102 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The fire inside you asserts itself as beaming, radiant light. Your body is naturally luminescent, glowing with the effects of a primal [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171) cantrip. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up. The light is involuntary and constant; if [counteracted](/Rules.aspx?ID=371), it returns in 1d4 rounds. You suffer a –2 circumstance penalty on [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) and gain a +1 circumstance bonus on saves against [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100) effects and effects that inflict the [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) or [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) conditions.
name: Brightsoul
